meanings.definition: Apetalies: the condition of having no petals
meanings.sent1: The flower's apetalies made it look unique in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The apetalies of the daisy surprised the botanist.
meanings.sent3: The apetalies of the rose caused quite a stir among the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her bouquet was a collection of apetalies, symbolizing simplicity and elegance.
meanings.sent5: The apetalies of the sunflower stood out boldly against the green backdrop.

meanings.sent1: The apetalies plant stood out in the garden with its unique appearance.
meanings.sent2: The apetalies flower was a topic of discussion among the gardeners.
meanings.sent3: The apetalies tree seemed to be playing a game of hide-and-seek with its missing petals.
meanings.sent4: Her dress, with its apetalies design, was a fashion statement at the event.
meanings.sent5: The apetalies landscape looked like a painting come to life in the afternoon sun.
